node.name: Decentral Intelligence Agency
node.description: Our mission, if we choose to accept it, is one of meta-coordination; rise above our personal incentives to collectively gather, synthesize, and distribute intelligence and best practices around DAOs for the public good.

authorities.label: Create, mint, edit, and revoke DIA contributor Hats

node.name: Agent
node.description: Hat intended for new, passive, and occasional contributors. You will receive notifications of meetings and other coordination events.

authorities.label: Welcome to attend DIA Briefing and DIA Rendezvous meetings

node.name: Director
node.description: Hat intended for active, consistent contributors. You may request Director role from other directors in the #roles channel in the DIA Discord. Alongside your request, please include your previous contributions and what you intend to contribute in the future.

authorities.label: Director Role in the DIA Discord - full administrative permissions
Invite and approve new requests to become Director

node.name: Curator
node.description: The core mechanism of The DIA is to ingest, synthesize, and signal-boost high-value intel about DAOs. We do this via the Curation Engine. Curators are responsible for contributing to the Curation Engine (in the DIA Discord).

authorities.label: Curator Role in DIA Discord â€” access to post and curate in Curation channels

node.name: Secret Service
node.description: The invisible guardians of the DIA.

authorities.label: Discord administration, moderation, and protection of core secrets.
